frontMatter.title: RightClickVirusTotal
frontMatter.subtitle: Cross-Platform File Scanning with VirusTotal API
frontMatter.description: RightClickVirusTotal is a Python-based tool that adds file virus scanning directly to your context menu via the VirusTotal API. Now available with CLI and GUI for Windows, Linux, and macOS.
frontMatter.keywords: RightClickVirusTotal, VirusTotal API, Python virus scanner, file analysis, security tool, Tkinter GUI, CLI scanner, cross-platform malware detection, right-click integration, PyInstaller, Windows context menu tool
